languages.text: Когда персонаж получает несколько {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранений{/g}, они замещаются травмой. Своевременно используйте медкомплект, чтобы исцелять ранения и не допускать появления травм. Избавиться от травм сложнее — вылечить их можно лишь отдохнув на корабле или в других специальных местах.

Once a character has suffered a certain number of {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}, these injuries are replaced with a {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}. Make use of medikits in time to treat injuries to avoid characters suffering traumas. Removing traumas is a more difficult task — they can only be healed by resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest.
languages.original_text: Когда персонаж получает несколько {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранений{/g}, они замещаются травмой. Своевременно используйте медкомплект, чтобы исцелять ранения и не допускать появления травм. Избавиться от травм сложнее — вылечить их можно лишь отдохнув на корабле или в других специальных местах.

traits.locale_text: Once a character has suffered a certain number of {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}, they are replaced with a trauma. Make use of medikits in time to treat injuries and avoid suffering traumas. Removing traumas is a more difficult task — they can only be healed by resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest.

Removing traumas is a more difficult task — they can only be healed by resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest.

Once a character has suffered a certain number of {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}, these injuries are replaced with a {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}. Make use of medikits in time to treat injuries to avoid characters suffering traumas. Removing traumas is a more difficult task — they can only be healed by resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest.

languages.text: Cuando un personaje sufre una cierta cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesiones{/g}, estas lesiones se sustituyen por una {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g}. Usa botiquines a tiempo para tratar las lesiones y evitar que tus personajes sufran aflicciones. Eliminar una aflicción es una tarea más difícil: solo se pueden curar descansando en la nave o en otros lugares adecuados.
languages.original_text: Once a character has suffered a certain number of {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}, these injuries are replaced with a {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}. Make use of medikits in time to treat injuries to avoid characters suffering traumas. Removing traumas is a more difficult task — they can only be healed by resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest.

traits.locale_text: Cuando un personaje sufre una cierta cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesiones{/g}, estas lesiones se sustituyen por una {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g}. Usa botiquines a tiempo para tratar las lesiones y evitar que tus personajes sufran aflicciones. Eliminar una aflicción es una tarea más difícil: solo se pueden curar descansando en la nave o en otros lugares adecuados.

languages.text: キャラクターが一定数の{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}を負うと、その負傷は{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}に置き換えられる。 メディキットを使って負傷を治療し、キャラクターが外傷を受けるのを防ごう。外傷を取り除くのはより困難であり、船上や休息に適した特定の場所で休息することでしか癒すことができない。
languages.original_text: Once a character has suffered a certain number of {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}, these injuries are replaced with a {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}. Make use of medikits in time to treat injuries to avoid characters suffering traumas. Removing traumas is a more difficult task — they can only be healed by resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest.

traits.locale_text: キャラクターが一定数の{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}を負うと、その負傷は{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}トラウマ{/g}に置き換えられる。 メディキットを使って負傷を治療し、キャラクターがトラウマを受けるのを防ごう。トラウマを取り除くのはより困難であり、船上や休息に適した特定の場所で休息することでしか癒すことができない。

languages.text: 当角色承受的{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}总量太多时，这些伤势会转化为{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}。 您需要使用医疗包及时治疗伤势，才能让角色避免受到创伤影响。与治疗伤势相比，消除创伤比较困难。只有在船上或其他适合休息的地方休息，才能消除创伤。
languages.original_text: Once a character has suffered a certain number of {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}, these injuries are replaced with a {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}. Make use of medikits in time to treat injuries to avoid characters suffering traumas. Removing traumas is a more difficult task — they can only be healed by resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest.

traits.locale_text: 当角色承受的{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}总量太多时，这些伤势会转化为{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}。 您需要使用医疗包及时治疗伤势，才能让角色避免受到创伤影响。与治疗伤势相比，消除创伤比较困难。只有在船上或其他适合休息的地方休息，才能消除创伤。

languages.text: Sobald ein Charakter eine bestimmte Anzahl von {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzungen{/g} erlitten hat, werden diese Verletzungen durch ein {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Trauma{/g} ersetzt. Verwende rechtzeitig Medikits, um Verletzungen zu behandeln, damit dein Charakter kein Trauma erleidet. Die Beseitigung von Traumata ist schwieriger – sie können nur geheilt werden, wenn du dich auf dem Schiff oder an bestimmten anderen geeigneten Orten ausruhst.
languages.original_text: Once a character has suffered a certain number of {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}, these injuries are replaced with a {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}. Make use of medikits in time to treat injuries to avoid characters suffering traumas. Removing traumas is a more difficult task — they can only be healed by resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest.

traits.locale_text: Sobald ein Charakter eine bestimmte Anzahl von {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzungen{/g} erlitten hat, werden diese Verletzungen durch ein {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Trauma{/g} ersetzt. Verwende rechtzeitig Medikits, um Verletzungen zu behandeln, damit dein Charakter kein Trauma erleidet. Die Beseitigung von Traumata ist schwieriger – sie können nur geheilt werden, wenn du dich auf dem Schiff oder an bestimmten anderen geeigneten Orten ausruhst.

languages.text: Lorsqu'un personnage a subi un certain nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésions{/g}, celles-ci laissent place à un {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatisme{/g}. Utilisez les médikits à temps pour soigner les blessures et éviter que les personnages ne souffrent de traumatismes. Il est plus difficile de remédier aux traumatismes, qui ne peuvent être guéris qu'en se reposant à bord du vaisseau ou dans d'autres endroits propices au repos.
languages.original_text: Once a character has suffered a certain number of {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}, these injuries are replaced with a {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}. Make use of medikits in time to treat injuries to avoid characters suffering traumas. Removing traumas is a more difficult task — they can only be healed by resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'un personnage a subi un certain nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}blessures{/g}, celles-ci laissent place à un {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatisme{/g}. Utilisez les médikits à temps pour soigner les blessures afin d'éviter que les personnages ne souffrent de traumatismes. Il est plus difficile de remédier aux traumatismes, qui ne peuvent être guéris qu'en se reposant sur le vaisseau ou dans d'autres endroits propices au repos.
